Hashirama, Tobirama and Hiruzen use a combination of [[Wood Release|wood]], [[Water Release|water]] and [[Fire Release|fire]] to push away the opponent. Hashirama uses [[Wood Release Secret Technique: Nativity of a World of Trees]] to create a forest in which Tobirama and Hiruzen strike the opponent using a [[Fire Release: Fire Dragon Flame Bullet|fire]] and [[Water Release: Water Severing Wave|water]] combination. The three [[Hokage]] then strike the opponent, with Hashirama using [[Chakra Enhanced Strength]], Tobirama kicking the opponent and Hiruzen summoning [[Monkey King: Enma]] and striking the opponent with the adamantine staff. The force of the attacks explodes the forest in the process.
